definition: to cover/to hide from view/to obstruct or block/defilade (military)
to cover up (a shortcoming)/to screen off/to hide/to conceal

sentences.english: I realized there was no fog veiling my window.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到，我的窗没有被云雾遮蔽。

sentences.english: Angered even further, Kojiro leapt into combat, blinded by rage.
sentences.chinese: 因此，小次郎更加愤怒了，而被怒气遮蔽了双眼。

sentences.english: The little porch was hidden from view by a screen of yellow roses and Southern smilax.
sentences.chinese: 而那个小门廊则被满眼的黄玫瑰和南方天冬草所遮蔽。

sentences.english: Artificial methods, such as white-out of corrections, are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 禁止以人为方式，例如使用修改液，遮蔽被修改处。

sentences.english: Know that darkness is only a veil.
sentences.chinese: 知道黑暗仅仅是遮蔽物。
为我的歇息之处遮蔽黎明白日。

sentences.english: The cottage was shadowed by palm trees.
sentences.chinese: 这间小屋被棕榈树的阴影遮蔽着。

sentences.english: Just, the sorrow of parting was camouflaged by the dark night at that moment.
sentences.chinese: 只是，那时夜晚的黑幕遮蔽了离别的哀愁。

sentences.english: Clouds want to cover the fabulous sun.
sentences.chinese: 云朵想要遮蔽那轮惊艳的太阳。

sentences.english: In the sheltering under the sky, I dare to order, also can not think.
sentences.chinese: 在无遮蔽的天空之下，我不敢下阶去，也无法可想。

sentences.english: Cover shrouding on busbar provides extra protection.
sentences.chinese: 以保护盖遮蔽母线提供额外保护。

sentences.english: Don't forget to put some masking tape on the windows before you paint the frames.
sentences.chinese: 漆窗框时别忘了在玻璃窗上粘遮蔽胶带。

sentences.english: A densely foliated lemon tree permanently shades half the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 一棵枝叶浓茂的柠檬树常年遮蔽住场地的一半。

sentences.english: The head was brownish with dark streaking and a dark eye and ear-covert patch.
sentences.chinese: 呈褐色有条纹的头部，黑色的眼睛和遮蔽耳朵的眼罩。

sentences.english: Indicates that an object's text representation is obscured by characters such as asterisks.
sentences.chinese: 代表物件的文字表示由星号之类的字元所遮蔽。

sentences.english: Vertically enclosed space is serviced for special class garden and tour path.
sentences.chinese: 垂直遮蔽型适用于专类园和游步径。

definition: to cover/to mask/to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)
to vanish gradually/to disappear/to fade out
